## ifThenElse() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Creates an `IfBlock` that has then- and else-blocks.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function ifThenElse(condition: string, thenBlock: MappingTemplateItem[], elseBlock: MappingTemplateItem[]): IfBlock;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  condition | string |  |
|  thenBlock | [MappingTemplateItem](./mapping-template-compose.mappingtemplateitem.md)<!-- -->\[\] |  |
|  elseBlock | [MappingTemplateItem](./mapping-template-compose.mappingtemplateitem.md)<!-- -->\[\] |  |

**Returns:**

[IfBlock](./mapping-template-compose.ifblock.md)
